儿童和青少年偏头痛诊断中发现的种族差异根据2025年2月5日在在线神经病学上发表的一项研究，黑人或西班牙裔儿童和西班牙裔的儿童和年轻人不太可能被诊断出患有偏头痛。美国神经病学医学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/racial-disparities-found-in-migraine-diaros-for-for-children-and-children-and-teens.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/racial-disparities-found-found-in-migraine-diarosis-for-children-and-children-and-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e28f6de4-1c26-4854-ab04-ab04-b7e5ff862ed7 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 20:38:51 -0500 Racial disparities found in migraine diagnosis for children and teens

突破性的个性化疫苗显示出有希望的肾癌试验结果DANA-FARBER癌症研究所的研究人员报告说，一项临床试验中的所有9例患者均接受了III期或IV期透明细胞肾细胞癌（一种肾癌的一种形式），在启动个性化癌症疫苗后产生了成功的抗癌免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/breakthrough-personalized-vaccine-vaccine-shows-promisis-promisis-romisish-results-in-kidney-cancer-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/breakthrough-personalized-vaccine-shows-promisis-promisis-romisish-results-in-kidney-cancer-trial-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d02ca656-fefe-4E9B-9092-9A9AD9AD9DAFBC5 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 20:23:46 -0500 Breakthrough personalized vaccine shows promising results in kidney cancer trial
研究可以为常规的眼神成像作为疾病筛查工具铺平道路研究人员已经进行了世界上最大的眼睛研究之一，以揭示对视网膜厚度的新见解，从而突出了其在早期发现2型糖尿病，痴呆和多发性硬化症等疾病中的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/study-could-pave-the-way-for-for-routine-routine-eyecare-image-imaging-imaging-imaging-as-a-a-a-a-disease-screening-screening-screening-tool.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/study-could-pave-pave-the-way-for-routine-routine-eyecare-image-imaging-imaging-imaging-imaging-aas-a-a-a-disease-sease-screening-screening-screening-tool.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=508EC6B7-3DD6-455F-A899-F7E7E702BC37EB Wed, 05 Feb 2025 14:05:47 -0500 Study could pave the way for routine eyecare imaging as a disease screening tool

新药类可以通过靶向中枢神经系统来帮助减轻IBS症状肠易激综合征（IBS）是一种常见的消化疾病，会影响肠道，引起诸如腹痛，腹胀，气体和肠习惯的变化等症状，包括腹泻，便秘或两者兼而有之。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/new-drug-class-may-help-allep-alleviate-ibs-symptoms--逐个靶向the-Central-nervous-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/new-drug-class-may-help-allep-alleviate-ibs-symptoms-targeting-the-centragenting-the-central-nervous-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5135CE2D-1423-410C-9E50-FC7DB2B2B26FE1 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 12:14:42 -0500 New drug class may help alleviate IBS symptoms by targeting the central nervous system
